opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Osborne v. HARTFORD LIFE AND ACCIDENT INSURANCE COMPANY

opinion:
128 S.Ct. 46 (2007)

Bruce OSBORNE, petitioner,
v.
HARTFORD LIFE AND ACCIDENT INSURANCE COMPANY.

No. 06-1350.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 1, 2007.

Motion to substitute the Estate of Bruce R. Osborne in place of Bruce Osborne, deceased, granted. Petition for writ of *47 certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
